# Overview {-}

## Workshop Description
A digital (online) portfolio complements you CV and other application materials on the job market or in grant applications and demonstrates your skills to potential collaborators and employers.  In this workshop, we will discuss reasons you want to create a digital portfolio of your work, methods for creating it, and considerations for carefully curating and presenting your work in an engaging manner.	

## Learning Objectives
Participants will 

* Learn reasons to create a digital portfolio
* Set a clear goal for their portfolio
* Understand methods for creating and curating their digital portfolio
* Be able to articulate reasons to choose a particular platform to host their portfolio
* Learn how and when to get feedback
* Learn about sharing their portfolio


## Prerequisites
Participants should have access to a web browser (for example, Chrome or Firefox).

See the next section ([Prepare](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_portfolios/prepare.html)) for recommended preparation for this workshop.
